skate.translation[0].definitions[0].defi: one of a pair of boots with metal blades on the bottom, for moving quickly on ice
skate.translation[0].definitions[1].defi: one of a pair of boots or frames with small wheels on the bottom, for moving quickly on flat smooth surfaces
skate.translation[0].definitions[2].defi: a large flat sea fish that can be eaten
skate.translation[1].definitions[0].exam: The children skated on the frozen pond.
